mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardNo, contentsImg, contents, memberNo, viewCnt) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{contentsImg}, #{contents}, #{memberNo}, #{viewCnt})
mapper.select: select*from board where delyn='N' and memberNo=#{memberNo} ORDER BY boardNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes(boardNo, memberNo, like_check) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, 1);
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS likecnt FROM likes WHERE like_check = 1 AND boardNo = #{boardNo};
